# FarmaQuiero Agentic Wellness Assistant Demo

## Project Overview
Production-quality demo of an AI-powered wellness assistant integrated into an e-commerce storefront. Built with Next.js 14 (App Router), TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- TailwindCSS
- React Context for state management
- Hardcoded data (no database)
- Optional OpenAI integration for enhanced responses

## Key Features
- Wellness assistant with 4-step flow
- 30 hardcoded products + 6 kit bundles
- Rule-based recommendation engine
- Cart optimization with cross-sell suggestions
- Mock checkout flow
- Event logging for analytics
- Responsive mobile-first design

## Development Guidelines
- Use pink accent color (#E91E63) for brand consistency
- All data stored in /src/data/
- No external API dependencies (optional OpenAI)
- Cart persists in localStorage
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
- Clean, modern UI with generous whitespace

## Safety Rules
- No medical advice or dosing recommendations
- Include disclaimers on all wellness content
- Show pharmacist consultation warnings for sensitive conditions
- General wellness guidance only
